title: How To Love A Warrior - Novel Updates
tags: Death of Loved Ones   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   First Love   Love at First Sight   Magic   Magic Beasts   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Sword And Magic   Time Travel   Tragic Past   Unrequited Love
author: 별고래파이
description:
I killed the boy I liked today.

He asked me to kill him in the future.

I didn’t ask for it, but…

What can I do? I wanted to fulfill the wishes of the person I liked.

I’m in a position of unrequited love. He was an absolute abbreviation for love.

* * *

When the war between demons and humans continues for hundreds of years, Chase, a boy Julia had a crush on, leaves the village after being chosen as the ‘hero of prophecy’ who will lead humans to victory and leaves the village.

One day, Chase, who suddenly appeared in the village, tells an unbelievable story to his lover Isabella.

When he dies, he returns to the past, and he can never die until he gets rid of all evil beasts in this world.

Julia, who overheard Chase’s story, was suddenly killed by a beast, who entered the village, somehow, reverts back to when she was 12……>
